sentences.english: This article is the research ofluoshan puppet from cultural aspect.
sentences.chinese: 本文是從文化學的層面對羅山皮影戲進行研究。

sentences.english: Shadow play is vivid and also very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 你看這皮影戲，既生動又有趣。

sentences.english: For example, puppet show is the best cut point to research.
sentences.chinese: 其中，傀儡戲皮影戲是一個分析研究的最佳切入點。

sentences.english: Shadow is the shadow of civil leather used in the images.
sentences.chinese: 皮影是民間皮影戲所用的皮製人物形象。

sentences.english: Like figures in a shadow theater, silhouettes of prey show through a Philippine pitcher plant.
sentences.chinese: 菲律賓豬籠草獵物剪影，有點像皮影戲。

sentences.english: Originated from Han dynasty, Shadow-play becomes popular among ordinary people in Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 皮影戲發源於漢朝，唐以後流傳民間。

sentences.english: Shadow theatre became quite popular as early as the Song Dynasty when holidays were marked by the presentation of many shadow plays.
sentences.chinese: 皮影戲在宋代很盛行，逢年過節皮影戲的演出很多。

sentences.english: Shadow theatre became quite popular as early as the Song Dynasty when holidays were marked by the presentation of many shadow plays.
sentences.chinese: 皮影戲在宋代很盛行，逢年過節皮影戲的演出很多。

sentences.english: The shadow play in Tongbai is one kind of opera in south Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 桐柏皮影戲是流行於豫南地區的一種戲曲藝術形式。

sentences.english: The earliest shadow theatre screens were made of mulberry paper.
sentences.chinese: 早期皮影戲幕布是用桑皮紙製成的。

sentences.english: Such exchanges are a form of pi ying xi, China's traditional shadow puppet theater.
sentences.chinese: 這種交流是一種皮影戲，中國傳統的影子玩具表演。

sentences.english: It seems Daniel has a surely great interest in shadow play.
sentences.chinese: 看來這大牛對皮影戲還真挺感興趣的。

sentences.english: China's shadow appears one of the earliest opera drama.
sentences.chinese: 皮影戲是我國出現最早的戲曲劇種之一。

sentences.english: This farmer, He Fulin, is a shadow-play lover.
sentences.chinese: 這位農民，福臨人，是一個皮影戲的愛好者。

sentences.english: Shadow puppets were first made of paper sculpture, later from the hides of donkeys or oxen.
sentences.chinese: 皮影戲最早是由紙張剪制而成，逐步改進爲皮革刻制。

sentences.english: What can you perform in shadow puppetry?
sentences.chinese: 那師父這皮影戲還能演什麼？

definition: stilts/walking on stilts as component of folk dance
type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
Tonggu county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi
opera highlights performed as independent pieces
